headline.main: GROUP TO PREPARE WAR LOOT CLAIMS; Committee Organized to Represent American Investors Plundered by Axis 5 BILLION LOSSES SEEN Objective Is to Pave the Way for Prompt Settlement for Damages Sustained

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 2 -- Creation of a foreign propertyholders protective committee to represent some 2,000,000 American investors who have had an estimated $5,000,000,000 of property systematically destroyed or looted by the Axis in the global war zones was announced today by Eugene P. Thomas, president of the National Foreign Trade Council, Inc.
abstract: Natl Foreign Trade Council names com headed by J A Moffett to represent US investors' claims for property destroyed or looted by Axis; BEW estimate of Nazi plunder cited; com lists plans
